text: Katerina Sakellaropoulou (, born 30 May 1956) is a Greek politician. She is the 13th President of Greece. She took office on 13 March 2020 to 13 March 2025. She was elected to replace Prokopis Pavlopoulos by parliament on 22 January 2020. Sakellaropoulou is Greece's first female president. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Greek judges Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Greece Category:Current national leaders
title: Katerina Sakellaropoulou
